file_content.text: You have passed the trials. The Mystics can teach you more.
The trials claim many. Do not enter the Proving Grounds lightly.
I guard the Proving Grounds. The trials lie beyond.
No one seems to know much about these trials.
That's all you're saying?
The trials are for the Mystics. We cannot understand.
I'm eager to begin.
Don't I get a reward?
Then you must face the trials.
Few Voss survive. Your fate is almost certain.
I seek to learn about the Voss, no matter the risk.
I still have to try.
An outsider will never know everything.
Unless the Mystics have seen it, I wouldn't be so sure.
Nothing is certain.
You have respect. You are not Voss.
We outsiders have a few tricks of our own.
Don't be so sure.
A Mystic does not use tricks.
A lot of people have promised to kill me, but I'm still here.
I might surprise you.
Luck.
Thanks for the warning.
I suppose you think a Voss like you would make it.
Like you could do better.
I am not a Mystic.
You have walked the path. You may enter the Proving Grounds.
I was told to inform Garel-Mo that the path of pilgrimage has been cleared.
That is why I acknowledge you.
The shrine is for the Mystics. You do not belong here.
The shrine's lower chambers are open to you. The upper chambers are for those who pass the trials.
I defeated all those Gormak, and I deserve access.
That's not fair!
If I wanted to attempt the trials, where would I start?
I'd like to try.
